person.persName: John H. Pierce (Clay County, Kentucky, student, teacher, and clerk)

body.p: Clay County, Kentucky, student, teacher, and clerk. Kentucky native. Son of Thomas Pierce and Nancy Hibbard Pierce. Student in Knox County, Kentucky, in 1850. Teacher in Clay County in 1860. Household held one enslaved person in trust for [Unknown] [Unknown] in Clay County in 1860. Clerk in Clay County in 1863.
